Title: Provides an exemption of any award from the September eleventh victim compensation fund from application to the satisfaction of money judgments
Summary: Provides an exemption of any award from the September eleventh victim compensation fund from application to the satisfaction of money judgements.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to providing an exemption of any award from the September eleventh victim compensation fund from application to the satisfaction of money judgments
